summary: This Mod adds a Spell to summon Sanguine
descriptionHtml:
[u][b]DESCRIPTION:[/b][/u]
The goal of this mod is, to add the possibility to conjure Sanguine as Follower.
Simply find the Spellbook in Pinewatch.

The Spellbook is \"hidden\" (not really ;) next to the door of Pinewatch (see images/screenshots for details)
After you\'ve learned the spell, you can find it in your magic menu (Conjuration).

It\'s meant to be a fun-mod, therefore he is overpowered, be careful! ;)

It\'s NOT necessary to complete the drink contest with Sam, this mod runs completly independent from the quest.


[u][b]FAQs:[/b][/u]
[b]Q:[/b] Any special Requirements (DLCs)?
[b]A:[/b] Nope

[b]Q:[/b] Any possible Conflicts?
[b]A:[/b] Nope, since the changes are duplicates with other ID\'s there shouldn\'t be any issues.

[b]Q: [/b]The summoned Sanguine is a little bit overpowered
[b]A:[/b] Yes, he is, that is on Purpose

[b]Q:[/b] Unrelenting Force hits me
[b]A: [/b]Yes, it\'s fun ;) (which means, it\'s on purpose)

[b]Q:[/b] Where is the Spellbook?
[b]A:[/b] You can find it next to the door of Pinewatch, between Falkreath and Helgen (see images for details)
author: Dusa
